mapper.select: SELECT bno, writer, title, regdate, replycnt FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT bno, writer, title, regdate, replycnt FROM tbl_board ORDER BY bno DESC) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board VALUES (seq_board.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, updatedate=sysdate WHERE bno=#{bno}
UPDATE tbl_board SET replycnt = replycnt + #{amount} WHERE bno=#{bno}
